column2: "Na ɔbɔfo a otsia enum no hɛnee
column3: na muhun woraba bi a ofi sor atɔ asaase do: na wɔdze mona a obi nnhu mbrɛ no mu dɔ kɛpem no ne saafee maa no."

column2: "Na obuee mona a wonnhu mbrɛ no mu dɔ tse no; na wusiw a ɔtse dɛ fononoo kɛse mu wusiw fii mona no mu firii; na ewia na wimu yɛɛ sum wɔ mona no no wusiw no ntsi."
"Na mbɛbɛw fi wusiw no mu baa asaase do; na wɔmaa hɔn tum a ɔtse dɛ asaase do nyankoma nketsebowa tum."
"Na wɔkaa kyerɛɛ hɔn dɛ mma wɔnnhaw asaase do nkyɛkyɛr
column5: gyedɛ nyimpa a wonnyi Nyankopɔn nsɔwano wɔ hɔn momapɔw do no nko."

column2: "Na wɔmaa hɔn kwan dɛ mma wonnku hɔn
column3: na mbom wɔnhaw hɔn araa abosoom enum: na hɔn haw tse dɛ nyankoma nketsebowa aka nyimpa."

column2: "Na nda no mu nyimpa bɔhwehwɛ owu naaso worinnya; na hɔn kɔn bɔdɔ dɛ wowu
column3: na owu befi hɔn nkyɛn eguan."

column2: "Na mbɛbɛw no suban tse dɛ mpɔnkɔ a woesiesie hɔn ama ɔko; na hɔn etsifi wɔ adze bi a ɔyɛ dɛ sika ahenkyɛw
column3: na hɔn enyim tse dɛ nyimpa enyim."

column2: "Na wɔwɔ nhwi tse dɛ mbaa dze
column3: na hɔn se tse dɛ ngyata dze."

column2: "Na wɔwɔ nkatabo a ɔtse dɛ dadze nkatabo; na hɔn ntsaban mu gyegye tse dɛ mpɔnkɔ pii tseaseanam a wɔdze twitwi rokɔ sa dze."
"Na hɔn dua tsetse dɛ nyankoma nketsebowa dze
column3: na ohwirom so; na hɔn ndua mu na hɔn tum a wɔdze haw nyimpa abosoom enum no wɔ."

column2: "Na wɔwɔ hɔn do hen a ɔno nye mona a wonnhu no bun ase no mu ɔbɔfo no: ne dzin wɔ Hebriw mu nye Abaddon
"Mbusu kor etwa mu. Hwɛ
column3: iyi ekyir no mbusu ebien da ho reba."

column2: "Na ɔbɔfo a otsia esia no hɛnee
column3: na metsee ndze kor bi a ofi sika afɔrmbukyia a osi Nyankopɔn enyim no ne mmbɛn no mu

column2: "obi a ɔreka kyerɛ ɔbɔfo a otsia esia no a okitsa totorobɛnto no dɛ
column3: Sansan abɔfo baanan a wɔamontan hɔn esutsen Eufrates ho no."

column2: "Na wɔsansaan abɔfo baanan no a woesiesie ama dɔn
column6: dɛ wonkuku nyimpa nkyekyɛmu ebiasa mu kor no."

column2: "Na metsee dɛ mpɔnkɔdofo dɔm no hɔn dodow yɛ ɔpepem ahaebien."
"Na mbrɛ muhun mpɔnkɔ no nye hɔn a wɔtsetse hɔn do
column3: wɔ enyido adzehu mu nye yi
column4: wɔwɔ nkatabo a no su yɛ ogya nye bruu a ɔhoa nye sɔɔfee
column5: na mpɔnkɔ no etsir tse dɛ ngyata etsir
column6: na gya nye wusiw nye sɔɔfee fi hɔn anomu."

column2: "Wɔnam mbusuhaw ebiasa yi do na wokunkum nyimpa nkyekyɛmu ebiasa mu kor
column5: nye sɔɔfee a ofi hɔn anomu no."

column2: "Na mpɔnkɔ no hɔn ahoɔdzen wɔ hɔn ano nye hɔn ndua: na iyi na wɔdze haw."
"Na adasa nkaa a wɔammfa mbusuhaw yi ennkuku hɔn no
column3: woennu hɔnho emmfi hɔn ndzeyɛɛ ho
column9: nye dua ehonyi a wonnhu adze

column2: "na woennu hɔnho emmfi hɔn ewudzi
